title: How to retrain my mind to just not give a fuq about meaningless stuff - Quora

response.answer_text: that’s a good question. throughout our life we think too much about nonsence. it is a common mistke, don’t feel guilty about it. i think that the most important thing is to be awere of it. when you awere about something, you know where you can improve. my tip for you is to try focus on what do you care the most? and which issues you should ignore? take a note and write down all those things. moreover, try to keep those questions in your mind. in the end, you will find all the answers :) and! dont take your life so seriously! everything and will be ok
